title: Evaluating interactions of patients with large language models for medical information
details: N Carl, S Haggenmüller, C Wies, L Nguyen… - BJU international, 2025
abstract: Objectives To explore the interaction of real‐world patients with a chatbot in a clinical setting, investigating key aspects of medical information provided by large language models (LLMs). Patients and methods The study enrolled 300 patients seeking …

title: EILEEN: A Multi-modal Framework For Extracting Alcohol Consumption Patterns From Bilingual Clinical Notes
details: HK Kim, Y Park, YJ Kim, S Yi, Y Park, S So, HJ Lee… - IEEE Access, 2025
abstract: In this work, we introduce EILEEN (Efficient Inference for Language-based Extraction of EHR Notes), a novel multi-modal natural language processing (NLP) framework designed to extract various alcohol consumption patterns from unstructured clinical …
